node.title: Falling & Failing in a Crisis
node.description: Maybe you've found yourself not being who you thought you would be in a crisis. Maybe you've fallen, or failed in ways that have filled you with shame. "I knew this time was coming and I wasn't ready, I'm such a loser, God has to be disappointed in me, etc." In this study we look at how God views us when we fall and fail in a crisis and what He still wants to do for us.
